app.name: WiiRadio
app.long_description:
WiiRadio is a SHOUTcast stream player. It can read from thousands of internet radio streams and play them back on the Wii.
Includes language packs, skinning capabilities and a full visualizer.
Coding By: Scanff and Knarrff Graphics By: TiMeBoMb
